DOC.brief_title: Japan Unified Protocol Clinical Trial Depressive Anxiety Disorders ( JUNP Study )
DOC.detailed_description: Participants depressive anxiety disorder randomize either Unified Protocol Treatment-As-Usual Wail-list Treatment-As-Usual . Intervention period 20-week follow-up period 43 week registration .
